statements: DELETE FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND admission_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 101 AND age >= 30
DELETE FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND gender = 'Male'
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND age > 50

DELETE FROM Diseases WHERE disease_name = 'Influenza' AND affected_population = 'All ages'

DELETE FROM lab_results WHERE test_name = 'Blood Test' AND result_value > 100;
